me.desht.sensibletoolbox.api.enderstorage

Class EnderStorage

  • java.lang.Object
    • me.desht.sensibletoolbox.api.enderstorage.EnderStorage

  • public class EnderStorage
extends Object
    Top-level utility methods for interacting with ender inventories.

    Note that the STB inventory system is orthogonal to the vanilla Minecraft ender storage; the inventory retrieved by the Bukkit HumanEntity.getEnderChest() method is not connected to any custom STB ender inventory.

      • getEnderInventory

        public static Inventory getEnderInventory(OfflinePlayer player,
                          int frequency)
        Get the personal ender inventory for the given player and frequency. Note that this inventory is not related to the inventory returned by the Bukkit HumanEntity.getEnderChest() method.
        Parameters:
        player - the player
        frequency - the ender frequency to use
        Returns:
        an ender inventory

        Parameters:
        frequency - the ender frequency to use
        Returns:
        an ender inventory
